creator: schreibchris@gmx.de
text:
Moving document-does-not-exist.xsl to the default publication to customize 
individually when creating new publications.
Added lenya-dev@cocoon.apache.org to CC-list of this bug.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
It shouldn't be moved to the default publication, but a fallback mechanism
should be used to retrieve this file to allow custom 404 screens for publications.
creator: andreas@apache.org
gregor@apache.org
text: the fallback:// is there, so this only needs to be changed.
